entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Onefour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:03 p.m. MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Snow beginning overnight. Blowing snow before morning. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm over the Cypress Hills. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow early in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the evening then becoming light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
